testcase.system-out: When Check Whether Last Modified Filter is Displayed........................passed And Click on Last Modified Date Filter......................................passed And Click on Last Modified Dropdown.........................................passed And Select Custom filter....................................................passed And Check particular date is displayed......................................passed And Click on Particular Date................................................passed And get The Selected Date and Store it......................................passed And Click on Contact Radio Button...........................................passed And Click on Search Button..................................................passed And Click On Reveal Contact Search Button...................................passed And Click on the First Contact in Search Result.............................passed And get the Contact Work Email and store it.................................passed And Launch Research Portal..................................................passed And Login To Research Portal................................................passed And Search Contact With Email...............................................passed Then Validate the Last modified Date In Research Portal Where updated within the Selected Date.passed
